_meanings:
{@--1@} Not felt, not 
perceptible by the mind, unknown.

‘an
unaccepted second sense’, one of
the faults of a word ({#Sabdadoza#}); {#amataH#}
{#prakftavirudDaH parArTo yatra#}; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} in  
{#rAmamanmaTaSareRa tAqitA#} &c. (<ls>R. 11. 20</ls>) the
second sense suggestive of {#SfMgArarasa#}
is opposed to the proper {%rasa%} of
the passage which is either {#vIra#} or
{#bIBatsa#}; <ls>K. P. 7.</ls>
